Osa Okunkpolor (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 11 n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1983), nke a maara dị ka Osa Seven, bụ onye na-ese ihe osise na Naijiria, onye na-emepụta akara na onye na-emepụta GFX. Ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe osise nke ndị na-ese onyinyo na ihe osise mara mma, atụmatụ akara, nka na-enweghị atụ, na atụmatụ nka agbụrụ.
Seven gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Visual Communications na Mahadum nke Lagos, Nigeria.
Seven arụọla ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta akara maka Food Concepts Plc ma na-agba ọsọ uwe Live Mechanics tupu akara Osa Seven
Seven brand arụkọla ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ MTV, Jameson, Absolut Vodka, Pernod Ricard, HP, Africa, Guinness, Smirnoff, Heineken, The Federal Government of Nigeria.

Seven, ya na Socially Africa, guzobere "Art For A Cause" nke bụ atụmatụ nke na-eji Art na-akpali ụmụaka.  Mmadụ asaa bụkwa ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo na WormFreeZone ma kụziere klas na British Council na Goethe Institute workshops.
E gosipụtara Seven na CNN Africa Voices
A họpụtara Seven maka The Future Awards Africa 2016 nke "The Future Awards Africa Prize for Arts & Culture"
